reviewText: Good to get these Jet Li movies on DVD, the world Video likes to cut corners. 2 of the movies  use the original theatrical subtitles, which for some people are hard to read, but I'm used to it and they are widescreen. Bodyguard they made new subtitles but they cheated by blacking the bottom part of the picture where the old subs and just put the new subs on top of that. Translation is good though. Nevertheless this was a good deal to get these 3 movies so I can complete my collection.
